001.name: player
001.text: Hello! I am Prisma and thank you for taking an interest in my adventure!

002.name: player
002.text: Sadly, due to the lack of the necessary Artistic mentality of my creator, you will have to survive staring at this minimalistic profile of mine.

003.name: Creator
003.text: To get the best experience out of this game, you should put your majestic imagination into use and visualize Prisma-chan as a hot and cute waifu.

004.name: player
004.text: Hey stop! You are embarrassing me. If you've got time to waste just keep working on my game!

005.name: Creator
005.text: You better get into character and start acting already, otherwise no-one will like you, the game will never be finished and you will make no friends!
